Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
The Hotel class represents the hotel entity in the hotel reservation system. It has a name, which is unique from the other hotels in the system, a list of rooms, with respect to the minimum and maximum number of rooms in a hotel, and a list of reservations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String name, int numRoom)
      Creates a new Hotel object for the given name and creates a number of room/s for the hotel based on the given number.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel.
      numRoom - the number of rooms to be created.

  • Method Details

    • sortRoomList

      private void sortRoomList()
      Sorts the rooms in the list of rooms under the hotel object based on their room numbers.

    • checkAvailability

      public boolean checkAvailability(Room room, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Checks if the given room is available within the given range of check-in and check-out date. Pre-condition: checkInDate is before checkOut, and checkInDate and checkOutDate is within the range of the minimum and maximum date reservation values.
      Parameters:
      room - the room object to be checked whether is available or not.
      checkInDate - the starting date to consider the availability of the room object.
      checkOutDate - the ending date to consider the availability of the room object.
      Returns:
      true if the given room is available within the given range and false otherwise.

    • checkAllRoomAvailability

      public boolean checkAllRoomAvailability()
      Checks the availability of all the rooms in the hotel object within the entire month.
      Returns:
      true if all the rooms are available and false otherwise.

    • changeAllRoomName

      public void changeAllRoomName()
      Changes the name of all the rooms under the hotel object based on the initial letter of the name of the hotel object.

    • getRoomIndex

      public int getRoomIndex(String name)
      Searches and gets the room index of the given room name based on the list of rooms under the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      name - the room name to be searched on from the list of rooms.
      Returns:
      the index of the room if found and -1 if not found.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(int numRoom)
      Creates and adds a number of rooms to the list of rooms under the hotel object based on the given number. Pre-condition: adding numRoom to the list will not exceed the maximum number of rooms for the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      numRoom - the number of rooms to create and add to the list of rooms.

    • removeRoom

      public boolean removeRoom(ArrayList<Integer> indexList)
      Removes a number of available rooms based on the given list of room index from the list of rooms. Pre-condition: removing a number of available rooms will not make the hotel room list empty.
      Parameters:
      indexList - the list of index of the rooms to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the list of index is valid and false otherwise.

    • updateRoomPrice

      public boolean updateRoomPrice(double price)
      Updates the prices of all the rooms under the hotel object. Pre-condition: all of the rooms under the hotel object is available.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price to be set across all the rooms.
      Returns:
      true if the given price is valid and false otherwise.

    • addReservation

      public boolean addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Creates and adds a reservation to the list of reservations under the hotel object given the guest name and check-in and check-out dates.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest for the reservation.
      checkInDate - the starting date for the reservation.
      checkOutDate - the ending date for the reservation.
      Returns:
      true if all parameters are valid and false otherwise.

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(int index)
      Removes a reservation from the list of reservations under the hotel object given the reservation index from the list. Pre-condition: there is an existing reservation under the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reservation from the list of reservations.
      Returns:
      true if index value is valid and false otherwise.

    • getTotalAvailableRooms

      public int getTotalAvailableRooms(int date)
      Gets the total number of available rooms under the hotel object based on the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered in getting the number of available rooms.
      Returns:
      the total number of available rooms with the given date and -1 if the date input is invalid.

    • getTotalBookedRooms

      public int getTotalBookedRooms(int date)
      Gets the total number of booked rooms under the hotel object based on the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered in getting the number of booked rooms.
      Returns:
      the total number of booked rooms with the given date and -1 if the date input is invalid.

    • getRoomInfo

      public String getRoomInfo(int index)
      Gets the information on the room based on the given index from the list of rooms under the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room to be considered from the list of rooms.
      Returns:
      the string room information and null if index input is invalid.

    • getReservationInfo

      public String getReservationInfo(int index)
      Gets the information on the reservation based on the given index from the list of reservations under the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reservation to be considered from the list of reservations.
      Returns:
      the string reservation information and null if index input is invalid.

      public static int getMinRoom()
      Returns the minimum number of rooms value for the hotel class.
      Returns:
      the minimum number of rooms value.

    • getMaxRoom

      public static int getMaxRoom()
      Returns the maximum number of rooms value for the hotel class.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of rooms value.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the name of the hotel.

    • getRoomList

      public ArrayList<Room> getRoomList()
      Returns the sorted list of room object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of room object/s under the hotel.

    • getReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      Returns the list of reservation object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of reservation object/s under the hotel.

    • getEarnings

      public double getEarnings()
      Gets and returns the total estimated earnings of the hotel object based on its reservation list.
      Returns:
      the total estimated earnings of the hotel.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the hotel object with the given name. Pre-condition: name is unique from the other hotels in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to be used to replace the name of the hotel.
